=== Additional Information ===

While not required, please post <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=490807|here]]</nowiki> or contact <nowiki>[[ChuckFrain|Chuck]]</nowiki> privately with your intentions of attending either as a helper or as an installee so we can get a rough head count. If you wish to meet in person before the event please feel free to attend our <nowiki>[[MarylandTeam/Meetings/2007July19|July 19th meeting]]</nowiki> at the Howard County Central Library at 7pm. As well as the install fest we'll be doing a GPG/PGP keysigning at about 2pm for those interested.
